rule: The output must never consist of only one word, and it must represent an invalid part-of-speech tag or any unaccepted option other than "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, 'VBZ', which is present in the list of allowable part-of-speech tags provided in the chatbot description. The output adheres to the requirement of returning only the tag. Since I don't have the input, I cannot evaluate the correctness of the tag.
OK
